name: D20 Companion
description: As a Game Master, this app will track your D20 game player positions and player initiative on a fully customizable grid of your choosing. Up to 10 adventurers and up to 20 enemies can be tracked at once. Customize your grid and size it for your battle's needs. Save table space for cheeseballs and laptops. Use this app discreetly on your mobile device or cast the map to a screen for all players to see. Initiative line-up is displayed to help speed up gameplay for large battles and keep you sane. This app is not a game in and of itself. This app is an aid to a Game Master who is running a D20-style game. Download today and change your player's game experience!
